billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Exempts social security or retirement benefits from definition of "income"
summary: Excludes social security and retirement benefits included in taxable income which do not exceed twenty thousand dollars from the definition of "income" for purposes of the private housing finance law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to the definition of income .il 2
